sources.title: Yes Sir, Mr. Bones (1951) Comedy, Music | Full Length Movie
sources.description:
A young boy finds himself in a home for retired minstrel acts. He's anxious to find out as much as he can about them, and flashbacks show what it was like back in the days of the minstrel shows.

Director:  Ron Ormond
Writer:  Ron Ormond
Stars:  Chick Watts, Cotton Watts, Ches Davis
Black and White
Featured in Jail Bait (1954)
Film debut of Scatman Crothers.

@CultCinemaClassics 
https://www.facebook.com/CultCinemaClassics 
https://www.instagram.com/cultcinemaclassics
https://www.twitch.tv/cultcinemaclassics

metadata.Plot: A young boy wanders into an old-folks' home and expresses interest in the old-time minstrel shows. The home's residents, former minstrel men, begin reminiscing via flashbacks, and the film cuts to a riverboat and an old-fashioned blackface minstrel show with songs, dances, vaudeville skits, and lots of banjo strumming.
metadata.Actors: Kathleen Freeman, Cotton Watts, Ches Davis
